about_the_game:
Hvor: Confrontation is a harsh survival shooter with horror elements.
Immerse yourself in the memories of a soldier of the Thunder squad. He passed on, but he left his memories in the pages of his diary. Follow his route, discover the secrets of the world seized by Hvor.
Hvor does not tolerate any mistakes. Danger lurks around every corner. The infected know no mercy, and it's up to you whether you run or fight.
Find creative ways to fight the enemy, use the environment, choose tactics that will help you survive.

short_description: This is a third-person survival horror game where you play as a police officer in a hostile world plagued by an unknown disease. Try to survive, destroy enemies, and remember: every misstep could be your last.
